title: iPhone SE 4 launch timeline tipped by Gurman, debunking January rumours | Mint - Mint
summary:
iPhone SE 4 Launch Timeline Confirmed for April 2025

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Live Mint

Apple's fourth-generation iPhone SE is expected to be released by April 2025, contrary to previous rumors of a January launch.

Key Points

  • Mark Gurman, an industry expert, confirmed the April timeline.
  • The device will feature a 6.1-inch LTPS OLED display and a new A18 chip.
  • It is expected to have a 48MP rear camera and 12MP front camera.
  • Pricing is anticipated to be under $500.
“If all goes to plan, Cupertino-based Apple is now planning a release by April.”

The anticipated launch of the iPhone SE 4 marks a continuation of Apple's trend of spring releases for its SE line.
newTitle: iPhone SE 4 Launch Timeline Confirmed for April 2025

title: The Time for an Xbox Handheld Is Now - CNET
summary:
The Time for an Xbox Handheld Is Now

Date: January 2025 Source: CNET

Microsoft is poised to enhance the Windows gaming handheld experience, as there are already several capable devices available. The company needs to accelerate its efforts to make these devices feel more like Xboxes, integrating Xbox-like experiences to attract gamers.

  • Increasing number of Windows gaming handhelds presented at CES 2025.
  • Devices from manufacturers like Lenovo, Acer, MSI, and Asus are on the market.
  • Microsoft admits the need for a seamless Xbox experience on Windows handhelds.
  • Phil Spencer indicates future plans to optimize Windows for handheld gaming.
  • Comparison with Steam Deck’s success highlights the potential for Microsoft.
“Our goal is to put the player and their library at the center of the experience and not all the [Windows] work that you have to do today.” - Jason Ronald, Microsoft

The future of handheld gaming hinges on Microsoft’s ability to unify Xbox and Windows experiences, particularly with new devices like the Lenovo Legion Go S entering the market.
newTitle: The Time for an Xbox Handheld Is Now

title: Your Pixel 4a may be eligible for battery replacement, monetary compensation following a firmware update - 91mobiles.com
Google addresses Pixel 4a battery performance, offers free replacements or compensation - Mint
summary:
Google Addresses Pixel 4a Battery Performance with Replacement Offers

Publication Date: January 8, 2023

Source: Live Mint

Google has started to roll out a software update for Pixel 4a smartphones, aiming to enhance battery performance stability while also offering compensation options for affected users.

  • The update introduces new battery management features targeting improved stability.
  • Affected devices may experience reduced battery capacity and slower charging speeds.
  • Users can opt for either a free battery replacement or financial compensation of $50 or $100 towards new Pixel devices.
  • Replacement services will be available at authorized centres in various countries, including the US, UK, and India.
  • The update will be automatically installed on devices, with a deadline for compensation claims set for January 8.
“This marks the final software update for the Pixel 4a, highlighting the challenges faced by ageing devices.”

This update seeks to balance long-term performance with user satisfaction as the Pixel 4a reaches the end of its software support cycle.
newTitle: Google Addresses Pixel 4a Battery Performance with Replacement Offers

title: This is the vivo X200 Ultra - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
Apple's inaccurate AI news alerts shows the tech has a growing misinformation problem - CNBC
summary:
Apple's inaccurate AI news alerts shows the tech has a growing misinformation problem

Publication Date: Not specified   |   Source: CNBC

This article discusses how Apple's AI news alert feature has been generating false news notifications, raising alarms about the reliability of AI in disseminating information. Recently, erroneous notifications concerning the PDC World Darts Championship and Rafael Nadal were sent to users, prompting concerns from news organizations like the BBC.

  • Apple's AI feature inaccurately reported that Luke Littler had won the Darts Championship before the final took place.
  • An unrelated notification falsely claimed that Rafael Nadal came out as gay.
  • The BBC has sought to rectify issues with Apple's AI-generated news summaries after previous inaccuracies.
  • The company stated it is working on updates to clarify when notifications come from Apple Intelligence.
  • Experts highlight the broader problem of AI-generated misinformation known as 'hallucinations.'
“Apple Intelligence features are in beta and we are continuously making improvements with the help of user feedback.”

In conclusion, as Apple tries to enhance its notification experience, the reliance on AI technology illustrates the delicate balance between innovation and accuracy in the digital age.
newTitle: Apple's AI News Alerts Raise Misinformation Concerns

title: Apple to ‘clarify’ AI-generated summaries after BBC flags factual errors - The Indian Express
summary:
Apple to ‘clarify’ AI-generated summaries after BBC flags factual errors

Date: Not specified Source: The Indian Express

Apple announced that it will refine AI-generated summaries after the BBC highlighted several inaccuracies in its outputs.

  • Apple Intelligence will see updates for clearer distinctions on AI-generated texts.
  • The BBC noted an incident where a summary incorrectly suggested the UnitedHealthcare shooting suspect had died by suicide.
  • Other inaccuracies included mislabeling the PDC World Darts Championship winner and erroneous claims about Rafael Nadal.
  • Apple allows users to disable AI-generated summaries or customize settings for specific apps.
  • Current Apple Intelligence features are limited to iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPhone 16, and M1 and later devices.
“These AI summarisations by Apple do not reflect – and in some cases completely contradict – the original BBC content.”

This response from Apple addresses the growing concern over the reliability of AI-generated content and its potential impact on information dissemination.
newTitle: Apple to ‘clarify’ AI-generated summaries after BBC flags factual errors

title: Microsoft talks about combining 'best of Xbox and Windows' for gaming handhelds - Notebookcheck.net
summary:
Microsoft Plans to Combine Xbox and Windows Gaming for Handhelds

Publication Date: 2025-01-08 Source: Notebookcheck

Microsoft is exploring ways to unify the Xbox and Windows gaming experiences for handheld devices, despite an Xbox gaming handheld potentially still being years away.

  • Currently available Windows gaming handhelds can access Xbox titles through Game Pass, but it's not a native gaming experience.
  • Microsoft aims to create a more console-like experience on Windows handhelds, according to Jason Ronald, VP of Next Generation.
  • Improvements will focus on enhancing controller support and redesigning the interface for handheld users.
  • Microsoft is not planning a custom Xbox OS for handhelds but will introduce Xbox-centric features instead.
  • Improvements are expected to follow the recent UI overhaul of the Xbox app on Windows handhelds.
“We want to make it much more like a console experience, where you and your library remain the center of the experience.” - Jason Ronald

The planned enhancements aim to bridge the gap between Xbox console gaming and Windows handheld gaming, enhancing the overall user experience for gamers.
newTitle: Microsoft Plans to Combine Xbox and Windows Gaming for Handhelds

title: AMD Radeon RX 9070 GPU Benchmarked in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - OC3D
summary:
AMD’s Radeon RX 9070 impresses in early benchmark

Publication Date: January 2025 Source: OC3D

AMD's Radeon RX 9070 GPU has been benchmarked at CES, showcasing impressive performance in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6.

  • The RX 9070 achieved an average framerate of 99 FPS in native 4K at 'Extreme' settings.
  • This performance surpasses that of the Radeon RX 7900 XT benchmarked at the game's launch.
  • The testing utilized early drivers, indicating potential for improved performance with further optimizations.
  • The card features 16GB of VRAM, contributing to its strong performance potential.
  • AMD aims to provide strong value and market share with a focus on performance and competitive pricing.
“If this result is indicative of the RX 9070’s performance in other games, it looks like RDNA 4 will be a strong graphics architecture for AMD.”

In conclusion, AMD's RX 9070 shows promise for gamers, particularly with new RDNA 4 architecture insights anticipated soon.
newTitle: AMD Radeon RX 9070 GPU Benchmarked in Black Ops 6 - OC3D

Oppo is set to launch its flagship Reno smartphones in India on January 9, featuring the Reno 13 and Reno 13 Pro. The event will be live-streamed at 5 pm on Oppo's official YouTube and social media channels.

Key Points:

  • Oppo Reno 13 series will focus on AI features, including AI Livephoto and AI Summary.
  • First smartphones in India powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset.
  • IP66, IP68, and IP69 ratings for dust and water resistance, enabling underwater photography.
  • Design includes aerospace-grade aluminum frame and Corning Gorilla Glass 7i.
  • Triple-camera setup redesign and flat display with improved features.
  • Expected to start around Rs 31,400 in India.

Notable Quotes:

“The Reno 13 series will sport a triple-camera setup and a flat display.”

In conclusion, the launch of the Reno 13 series brings promising innovations and premium design, catering to tech enthusiasts and smartphone users alike.

title: Iyer Brothers drew from a vast repertoire of compositions at their veena concert - The Hindu
summary:
Iyer Brothers Showcase Rich Veena Repertoire at Margazhi Festival

Published: January 08, 2025 05:28 pm IST

Source: The Hindu

The Iyer Brothers, Ramnath and Gopinath, delivered a remarkable concert at the Kartik Fine Arts Margazhi festival 2024, showcasing their expertise and diverse repertoire of veena compositions.

  • The concert featured compositions such as Pallavi Gopala Iyer’s challenging Thodi varnam.
  • Muthuswamy Dikshitar’s ‘Mahaganapatim’ captivated with its swarakalpana section.
  • The brothers displayed their distinct techniques learned from renowned tutors.
  • The evening's main attraction was a Kalyani raga performance of ‘Etavunara’.
  • The recital concluded with Lalgudi Jayaraman's thillana in Mishra Shivaranjani.
“The brothers possess a vast repertoire, thanks to their tutelage under stalwarts such as R. Pichumani Iyer and Trivandrum R. Venkataraman.”

The Iyer Brothers' performance not only highlighted their technical skills but also their ability to engage the audience, reinforcing their reputation in the world of classical music.
newTitle: Iyer Brothers Showcase Rich Veena Repertoire at Margazhi Festival

summary:

Publication Date: January 2025 Source: Indian Express

Ahead of Republic Day, Amazon and Flipkart have announced their respective sales, offering significant discounts on various products.

  • Amazon's Great Republic Day Sale begins on January 13 for non-Prime members and on January 12 for Prime members.
  • Flipkart's Monumental Sale starts on January 14, with Plus members getting early access on January 13.
  • Amazon will offer up to 40% off on mobile phones and up to 65% off on smart TVs and home appliances.

title: New OLED tech could make Galaxy S26 Ultra’s screen brighter, more efficient - SamMobile - Samsung news
summary:
New OLED tech could make Galaxy S26 Ultra's screen brighter, more efficient

Date: January 8, 2025 Source: SamMobile

Samsung is set to enhance the Galaxy S26 Ultra's display with new OLED technology that promises increased brightness and efficiency.

  • The Galaxy S26 Ultra will utilize Color Filter on Encapsulation (CoE) technology, which replaces traditional polarizing plates in OLED screens.
  • This change allows for higher brightness while reducing power consumption.
  • The CoE method first appeared in the Galaxy Z Fold 3 and will be used in a flat-screen model for the first time.
  • The reported peak brightness could exceed 3,000 nits, surpassing the Galaxy S24’s 2,600 nits.
  • The technology aims to improve battery life alongside display performance.
“If the new report is accurate, we could see the display brightness cross the 3,000 nits mark next year.”

This evolution in display technology marks a significant step for Samsung, potentially leading to revolutionary advancements in smartphone screens.
newTitle: New OLED tech could make Galaxy S26 Ultra's screen brighter, more efficient

Publication Date: January 6, 2025 | Source: Herzindagi

Xiaomi's sub-brand Redmi has introduced its latest budget-friendly 5G smartphone, the Redmi 14C, bringing premium features to the sub-Rs 10,000 segment.

  • Price starts at Rs 9,999 for the 4GB + 64GB variant.
  • Features a 50MP dual-camera setup and an 8MP front camera.
  • Equipped with a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chipset and runs Android 14 with HyperOS.
  • Offers a 6.88-inch 120Hz display and supports 18W fast charging.
  • Comes with a long-lasting 5,160mAh battery with 21 days of standby time.
“The #Redmi14C 5G is built for all your entertainment needs...” — Redmi India

The Redmi 14C 5G offers an impressive combination of features and affordability, making it a strong competitor in the budget smartphone market.
